name: weaviate__mcp-server-weaviate
description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for Weaviate
readme:
# Weaviate MCP Server

## Instructions

Build the server:
```
make build
```

Run the test client
```
make run-client
```

## Tools

### Insert One
Insert an object into weaviate.

**Request body:**
```json
{}
```

**Response body**
```json
{}
```

### Query
Retrieve objects from weaviate with hybrid search.

**Request body:**
```json
{}
```

**Response body**
```json
{}
```
